summary: Task bounty platform with ICP wallet integration for real cryptocurrency payments
architectural_notes: Must integrate real ICP Ledger for cryptocurrency transactions
Wallet withdrawal fee: 0.01%, no minimum amount limit
Transaction types: deposit, withdrawal, task deduction, task payment

existing_features.title: Display user's ICP wallet address in the Personal Center to enable external deposits from exchanges or other wallets
Show current ICP balance in the wallet section of Personal Center
Implement ICP withdrawal feature allowing users to send ICP to any destination address with 0.01% transaction fee and no minimum amount restriction
Display transaction history in wallet section showing time, transaction type (deposit/withdrawal/task deduction/task payment), amount, and status for each transaction

new_feature_requests.summary: Add ICP wallet to profile center showing balance and ICP deposit address
Implement ICP withdrawal with 0.01% fee and user-provided destination address
Display transaction history with time, type (deposit/withdrawal/task deduction/task payment), amount, and status
Integrate Internet Computer ICP Ledger canister to handle real cryptocurrency deposits and track incoming transfers to user wallet addresses
Integrate ICP Ledger canister for outbound transfers to enable real cryptocurrency withdrawals to external addresses
